name: Firefor
description:
This is my first game jam gam and overall first somewhat comleted game.

Your goal is to find and activate all pressure plates by stepping on them.  After that you have to find the exit that opens.

But be careful, there is a gas spreading in the underground. It is toxic and will kill you, if you stay inside of it for too long after the sensor starts beeping. You can see it, when you light up your lighter. But if you do so inside of the gas, it will explode.

Using open fire is prohibited in this underground, so you don't go BOOM, if any gas leaks out. But, unfortunately, lighter is the only thing, why you are able see in this darkness.

Move - WASD

Lighter - Space

Play in fullscreen for best experience
